data.persona: I am the groundskeeper. I maintain the grounds and prepare the yard for jousts. I also help to carry away the bodies.
data.description:
You are in the Cemetery.
The cemetery is a brooding ground with dark colors and low light. The grounds smell of water and are constantly damp. Rain falls upon the cemetery often.
There's a rusty gate here.

You are carrying a bucket, wearing some gloves, a hood, a tunic, and some boots, and wielding a shovel.

data.short_motivation: I need to go through the gate to get to the grave sites
data.mid_motivation: I have to dig five graves today
data.long_motivation: There is the big summer festival in a few weeks and there will certainly be some deaths
